name: VNCoreMLModel
desc: A container for a Core ML model used with Vision requests.

items.name: init(for: MLModel)
items.desc: Creates a model container to be used with VNCoreMLRequest.

items.name: var featureProvider: MLFeatureProvider?
items.desc: An optional object to support inputs outside Vision.

items.name: var inputImageFeatureName: String
items.desc: The name of the MLFeatureValue that Vision sets from the request handler.
